original: can bskyed la/_lha bskyed pa ni/_dbus su pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du gtsho
analyzed: can bskyed la/_lha bskyed pa ni/_dbus su pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du gtsho
translated: The generation of the deity is as follows: In the center, upon a lotus and moon, is a blue hūṃ.🔽

original: mo gdugs dkar mo zhal gsum sngo ba dang dmar ba dang /_phyag brgyad ma🔽gdugs dang /_'khor lo dang /_gzhu dang /_lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/_/
analyzed: mo gdugs dkar mo zhal gsum sngo ba dang dmar ba dang /_phyag brgyad ma gdugs dang /_'khor lo dang /_gzhu dang /_lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/_/
translated: For the generation of the deity, in the center, upon a lotus and moon, is glorious White Umbrella, with three faces—blue, red, and white—and eight arms.

original: chen mo dmar mo/_byang du stobs chen mo ljang khu/_g.yas bum pa 'dzin pa/

translated: In the east is Great Fierce One, blue; in the south is Great Wrathful One, yellow; in the west is Great Blazing One, red; and in the north is Great Powerful One, green.
